name: Exodus Flight
description:
WASD - Move
E - Interact
Q - Switch Past/Future
SPACE - Jump (Future Only)

You find yourself awaking from a long hyper-sleep on the way to a newly colonized star system. The potential for a fresh start awaits! However, after sleeping for hundreds of years, you wake up to find out that you're not quite there yet. In particular, the spaceship's AI has gone rogue, determined to extinguish all organic life on the ship. In your awakened panic, you discover an intriguing wrist device that bends strands of time itself. Jumping between past and present, you must use your wits to escape this horrific future. Good luck!

Team Members:

Alex Hooi (Art)

Craig Duthie (Engineering)

Gaspard Hünenberger (Art)

Jorge Madrid Portillo (Audio)

Harrison Leon (Engineering)
